import React from 'react' import '../App.css'; import { useContext } from 'react' import noteContext from '../context/noteContext' import Modal from './Modal'; export default function Displaynotes(props) { const { deletenote, waitt } = useContext(noteContext); //getting the id const handleid = () => { console.log(note._id) waitt(note._id); } const { note } = props; const col = ["info", "warning", "primary", "success", "danger", "secondary"] return (
{note.Title}

{note.Description}

{ deletenote(note._id) }}>delete
Modal title
...
) }
